mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, STEXT_CHASU AS stextChasu, HANDLE_OCCUR_DATETIME AS handleOccurDatetime, HANDLE_SEQ_NO AS handleSeqNo, HANDLE_NOTICE_DATETIME AS handleNoticeDatetime, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_NAME AS handleNoticeEmpName, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_TELNO AS handleNoticeEmpTelno, HANDLE_REQ_DESC AS handleReqDesc, HANDLE_STATUS AS handleStatus, SMS_ENABLE AS smsEnable, CUSTOMER_NAME AS customerName, CUSTOMER_TELNO AS customerTelno, ERROR_TYPE AS errorType, ACCOUNT_NO AS accountNo, DEAL_SEQ_NO AS dealSeqNo, DEAL_AMOUNT AS dealAmount FROM ATMS_01001230

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, STEXT_CHASU AS stextChasu, HANDLE_OCCUR_DATETIME AS handleOccurDatetime, HANDLE_SEQ_NO AS handleSeqNo, HANDLE_NOTICE_DATETIME AS handleNoticeDatetime, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_NAME AS handleNoticeEmpName, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_TELNO AS handleNoticeEmpTelno, HANDLE_REQ_DESC AS handleReqDesc, HANDLE_STATUS AS handleStatus, SMS_ENABLE AS smsEnable, CUSTOMER_NAME AS customerName, CUSTOMER_TELNO AS customerTelno, ERROR_TYPE AS errorType, ACCOUNT_NO AS accountNo, DEAL_SEQ_NO AS dealSeqNo, DEAL_AMOUNT AS dealAmount FROM ATMS_01001230 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, HANDLE_OCCUR_DATETIME = #{handleOccurDatetime}, HANDLE_SEQ_NO = #{handleSeqNo}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001230 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, HANDLE_OCCUR_DATETIME = #{handleOccurDatetime}, HANDLE_SEQ_NO = #{handleSeqNo}

UPDATE ATMS_01001230 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, STEXT_CHASU = #{stextChasu}, HANDLE_NOTICE_DATETIME = #{handleNoticeDatetime}, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_NAME = #{handleNoticeEmpName}, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_TELNO = #{handleNoticeEmpTelno}, HANDLE_REQ_DESC = #{handleReqDesc}, HANDLE_STATUS = #{handleStatus}, SMS_ENABLE = #{smsEnable}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName}, CUSTOMER_TELNO = #{customerTelno}, ERROR_TYPE = #{errorType}, ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo}, DEAL_SEQ_NO = #{dealSeqNo}, DEAL_AMOUNT = #{dealAmount} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, HANDLE_OCCUR_DATETIME = #{handleOccurDatetime}, HANDLE_SEQ_NO = #{handleSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001230 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, STEXT_CHASU, HANDLE_OCCUR_DATETIME, HANDLE_SEQ_NO, HANDLE_NOTICE_DATETIME, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_NAME, HANDLE_NOTICE_EMP_TELNO, HANDLE_REQ_DESC, HANDLE_STATUS, SMS_ENABLE, CUSTOMER_NAME, CUSTOMER_TELNO, ERROR_TYPE, ACCOUNT_NO, DEAL_SEQ_NO, DEAL_AMOUNT ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{stextChasu}, #{handleOccurDatetime}, #{handleSeqNo}, #{handleNoticeDatetime}, #{handleNoticeEmpName}, #{handleNoticeEmpTelno}, #{handleReqDesc}, #{handleStatus}, #{smsEnable}, #{customerName}, #{customerTelno}, #{errorType}, #{accountNo}, #{dealSeqNo}, #{dealAmount} )
